Key Match Events: The Utah Jazz lost to the Los Angeles Clippers, 105-116.
Utah Jazz head coach Will Hardy benched starting point guard Keyonte George at the start of the third quarter due to dissatisfaction with his defense in the first half.
Isaiah Collier filled in for Keyonte George at the start of the third quarter, finishing the game with a career-high 26 minutes, posting four points, eight assists, and two steals.
Post-Match Reflections: Will Hardy explained his decision to bench Keyonte George, stating it was to reinforce good habits and not to punish the player.
Will Hardy expressed confidence in Keyonte George's potential despite his inconsistent performance.
